utils

Class KeyboardReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.KeyboardReader

  • public class KeyboardReader
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to enable input of data from the keyboard ensuring exceptions are handled here.
    Author:
    253737

        public int getInt(java.lang.String mes)

        Returns:

      • getInt

        public int getInt(java.lang.String mes,
                  int min,
                  int max)
        Ensures an integer is between the specified ranges.
        Parameters:
        mes - - message to display to the user
        min - - minimum accepted integer
        max - - maximum accepted integer
        Returns:
        - Integer entered by the user

      • getChoice

        public java.lang.String getChoice(java.lang.String mes,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> options)
        Get an option entered by the user from a selection of valid options.
        Parameters:
        mes - - Message to display.
        options - - List of valid options
        Returns:
        - Option entered by the user, can only be those in the options list
